description: Triangle of idempotent numbers binomial(n,k)*k^(n-k), version 4.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 91, #43 and p. 135, [3i'].
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n + 1, k]*(n - k + 1)^k; Flatten@Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] (* _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Mar 23 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) /* As triangle: */ [[Binomial(n+1,n-k+1)*(n-k+1)^k: k in [0..n]]: n in [0.. 15]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 22 2015
crossrefs: There are 4 versions: A059297-A059300. Diagonals give A001788, A036216, A040075, A050982, A002378, 3*A002417, etc. Row sums are A000248.
